templates.title: Template Library
templates.description: Choose a proven structure, or generate your own with AI, then remix it to perfection.
templates.modal.title: Preview: {{name}}
templates.modal.ai.title: Personalize with AI
templates.modal.ai.description: Give the AI your core concept, and it will generate personalized prompts for each section to get you started.
templates.modal.ai.placeholder: e.g., A grizzled space detective hunting a phantom thief across colonized planets.
templates.remix.title: Remix Template
templates.remix.description: Drag, edit, add, or delete sections to create your perfect structure.
templates.remix.descriptionHint: This is a preview. To edit, click 'Remix this Template'.
templates.custom.title: Create Your Own Template
templates.custom.description: Let AI build a bespoke structure for your unique story idea.
templates.custom.modalDescription: Describe your story, and our AI will architect a custom-tailored outline for you.
templates.custom.conceptPlaceholder: e.g., A slow-burn political thriller with a focus on betrayal.
templates.custom.elementsPlaceholder: e.g., Needs a mid-point reversal, a false victory, and a tragic ending.
templates.error.personalizationFailed: AI personalization failed. Applying the standard template instead.
templates.error.customGenerationFailed: AI template generation failed. Please try again or refine your prompt.
templates.threeAct.name: Three-Act Structure
templates.threeAct.description: A classic model for narrative fiction that divides a story into three parts: Setup, Confrontation, and Resolution.
templates.threeAct.arc: A foundational structure with a clear beginning, middle, and end. Builds tension steadily towards a single climax.
templates.herosJourney.name: The Hero's Journey
templates.herosJourney.description: A common template that involves a hero who goes on an adventure, wins a victory in a decisive crisis, and comes home changed.
templates.herosJourney.arc: A cyclical journey of transformation, taking a character from their ordinary world into the unknown and back again.
templates.saveTheCat.name: Save the Cat! Beat Sheet
templates.saveTheCat.description: A popular storytelling structure, especially for screenplays, that breaks a story down into 15 key 'beats' or plot points.
templates.saveTheCat.arc: A detailed, beat-by-beat guide for commercial storytelling, focusing on pacing and audience engagement.
templates.fichteanCurve.name: Fichtean Curve
templates.fichteanCurve.description: A structure that begins with rising action, leading through a series of crises to a climax, followed by a falling action.
templates.fichteanCurve.arc: A tension-focused arc that throws the reader directly into the action and maintains suspense through escalating crises.
templates.murderMystery.name: Murder Mystery
templates.murderMystery.description: A plot centered around a murder that a protagonist must solve. Includes clues, red herrings, and suspects.
templates.murderMystery.arc: A puzzle-box narrative that follows an investigation from crime to revelation, layered with misdirection.
templates.spaceOpera.name: Space Opera
templates.spaceOpera.description: A grand, adventurous story set in space, involving conflict, romance, and futuristic technology.
templates.spaceOpera.arc: An epic, galaxy-spanning adventure with high stakes, focusing on rebellion against a powerful foe.
templates.spaceOpera.sections.5: Journey to a Strange New World
templates.spaceOpera.sections.8: A Dogfight in the Asteroid Belt
templates.spaceOpera.sections.11: A New Hope for the Galaxy
templates.dystopian.name: Dystopian Fiction
templates.dystopian.description: A story set in a futuristic, imagined society where there is great suffering or injustice, typically one that is totalitarian or post-apocalyptic.
templates.dystopian.arc: A narrative of awakening and rebellion against a seemingly perfect but oppressive society.
templates.romance.name: Classic Romance
templates.romance.description: A genre template focusing on the development of a romantic relationship between two people.
templates.romance.arc: Follows the emotional journey of two characters as they meet, face conflict, and ultimately come together.
